alert.note: Alert for Burney Basin, Eastern Shasta County; Shasta Lake Area, Northern Shasta County; West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada; Western Plumas County, Lassen Park (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 03 at 4:16AM PST until March 05 at 1:00PM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...Winter Weather Returns Friday into Saturday... .A cold weather system will bring moderate snow to the southern Cascades and northern Sierra Nevada Friday afternoon through mid- day Saturday. Lowering snow levels Friday evening into early Saturday morning will bring snow down into the upper Sierra foothills. Those with travel plans to the mountains Friday afternoon and evening should plan for moderate snow showers and lowering snow levels, causing commute issues heading up to the mountains. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON FRIDAY TO 1 PM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...4 to 8 of snow inches expected, with localized amounts up to a foot. Plan on slippery road conditions, including during the evening commute on Friday. * WHERE...Burney Basin / Eastern Shasta County, Western Plumas County/Lassen Park and West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada, including Interstate 80 over Donner Pass and Highway 50 over Echo Summit. * WHEN...Noon Friday to 1 PM Saturday. Heaviest snow is expected between 4 PM Friday and 1 AM Saturday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Be prepared for reduced visibilities at times. Snow levels will be lowering to 1500 feet by Saturday morning, so light accumulations on grassy surfaces will be possible. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Be prepared for snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Burney Basin, Eastern Shasta County; Shasta Lake Area, Northern Shasta County; West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada; Western Plumas County, Lassen Park
